data.text: @thegrandlondon @morrisseyhouse I will boycott your discriminating business and hopefully everyone eles will. True colours shining threw the segregists

@thegrandlondon I really appreciate your efforts to help keep your actors safe. They can't wear masks when they perform so they are counting on us to help. It is the least we can do. If one if them gets sick, it shuts the  whole production down.
@thegrandlondon @morrisseyhouse I wont be visiting your location until you remove asking for my private health care information. I hope everyone else does to.
